Don't get me wrong, I'm not a snob,
I enjoy stupid and unambitious films, especially when stoned, but this is way too much. The Last Airbender is like Casablanca compared to this shit. In my stupidity I forgot to check IMDB page, because I thought "It's a movie about dragons, it has to be fun, right?" WRONG, fucking WRONG.  It's my second comment on this site and I've seen dozens of shitty movies from here, that's how bad it is. It's so boring you might die from a stroke, just because your brain decides to end it's suffering. It's worse than bubonic plague, worse than the holocaust. I think this film caused the earthquake in Japan. If I could go back in time I would kill myself before I started watching it.

If you don't hate yourself, don't watch this.

Damn I was scarce to watch this movie after all of the negative comments about it, but it is actually a decent movie. If you have actually read Moby Dick, which most of you punks probably haven't, it is a good new fantastical version of that classic story. It wasn't like it was in theaters! It's pretty much like the best thing you've ever seen on the sci-fi channel...Not a bad movie. Worth watching. Not bad, and in some cases good, production and acting. There is a reason why it is being downloaded so much.
